byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: benefit garden parties, Bar Harbor, Me
snippet: SOUTHAMPTON, L.I., June 30-- Mr. and Mrs. Robert L. Stevens, who are spending their first season here, gave a reception this afternoon at Fort Hill, their home in the Shinnecock Hills, for her mother, Mrs. Cornelius Vanderbilt of Beaulieu, Newport...

headline.main: RECEPTION GIVEN IN SOUTHAMPTON; Robert L. Stevenses Entertain for Mother of Mrs. Stevens, Mrs. Cornelius Vanderbilt C.G. PROFFITTS ARE HOSTS Give Luncheon for Dr. Fox, the President of Union College --Party for Atwater Kent

lead_paragraph: SOUTHAMPTON, L.I., June 30-- Mr. and Mrs. Robert L. Stevens, who are spending their first season here, gave a reception this afternoon at Fort Hill, their home in the Shinnecock Hills, for her mother, Mrs. Cornelius Vanderbilt of Beaulieu, Newport, who has joined them for a visit.
